issue.title: [Python] Expose compare kernels on Array class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5854](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5854). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Expose the compare kernel for comparing with scalar or array (ARROW-3087, ARROW-4990) on the python Array class.

This can implement the `\_\_eq\_\_` et al dunder methods on the Array class.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5854?focusedCommentId=17116113) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This should be fairly trivial now

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5854?focusedCommentId=17121082) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7273
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7273>
